content:
Save agents time and deliver more efficient and productive service experiences with AI-generated case summaries. At the end of a conversation between an agent and customer, Einstein predicts and fills a summary, issue, and resolution. Agents can then review, edit, and save these summaries.

Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise and Unlimited Editions with the Einstein for Service add-on

See the setup checklist to learn how to add Work Summaries to your service channels and what to expect during your rollout.

Step 1. Check your Einstein readiness.
Turn on features.
Try Work Summaries in Einstein Copilot (Beta).
Select channels to get summaries.
Get real-time summaries with Conversation Catch-Up.
Get acquainted with Work Summaries in the console.
Share insights from your data.

Enable Einstein Generative AI
Enable Work Summaries
Set Up Einstein Copilot (Beta)
Give Agents Access to Work Summaries
Prompt Builder
Show Work Summaries for Enhanced Messaging
Show Work Summaries for Voice
Show Work Summaries for Live Chat
Show Work Summaries for Email
Use Work Summaries in the Console

Einstein Generative AI
Trailhead: Einstein GPT: Quick Look
title: Implementing Work Summaries in Service Cloud
